title: "Medopad rebrands to Huma, makes acquisitions to bolster its AI health monitoring portfolio"
excerpt: "Digital health company Medopad today announced that it’s rebranding to Huma and acquiring two companies — BioBeats and Tarilian Laser Technologies (TLT) — to add support for new biomarkers to its AI-powered patient monitoring platform. When contacted for comment, a Huma spokesperson declined to disclose the purchase price for the two ..."
